song_lyrics: Sad‍gurukī bhakti kare soī, jāke dhaḍ par shīsh nā hoī... °ṭek
Ati karaḍā mārag chale na koī, kāyar ḍarī bhāge deve roī,
So to gurukī bhakti bin pāve shok,
So to koī shake nahi guru ke dās... ° 2
Jab tan man dhankī taje āsh,
title: Sad‍gurukī bhakti kare soī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-635: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
